lead_paragraph: Members of the New England Revolution helped subdue a passenger on a Boston-to-Los Angeles flight Friday afternoon. The passenger stripped nude, dressed and then tried to open an emergency exit door, the F.B.I. spokesman Gary Johnson said. The American Airlines flight was diverted to Oklahoma City because of the incident, and the man was removed from the airplane by the police in Oklahoma City.
